name: TheHistoryShow
0:
”Alexa, open the history show”
”Alexa, ask the history show for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start the history show”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the history show
des:
Drop those old primary sources, history buffs. The History Show comes to life with historical events. Better than going to class. 
The History Show has plenty to hear covering your favourite historical topics.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
